extendedInfo.description: busuu.com, the leading online community for language learning, brings you the perfect app to learn Polish on the go:â° In the latest release - Discounted offer to activate all courses! â Extensive vocabulary - over 3,000 words and key phrasesâ From beginner to advanced intermediate levels (A1 - B2)â Covering 150 different topics using day-to-day situationsâ Comprehensive audio-visual learning material with photos and recordings by native speakersâ Sections include vocabulary, dialogues and interactive testsâ No internet connection requiredâ Free version includes 20 complete learning units - full content can be purchased inside the app!â Learning progress can be synchronized with your profile on busuu.com, the famous online community for learning languages with over 15,000,000 usersâ Only language learning app in the world which includes direct interaction with native speakersâ Submit your writing exercises and get corrected by native speakers from our communityâ Enjoy the latest learning contentâ Now also supports Japanese and Mandarin as interface languagesâ New Travel CourseWhat our mobile app users say about us in their reviews:"You can learn at your own pace. Very useful!""Easy to learn and easy to understand""It is a super fun tool where you learn and interact with other people""This application is really great to learn. I love the correction by natives, practising with native speakers for free. Super app""This is better than my Rosetta Stone Spanish! It is more fun and it is free as opposed to the 500 plus dollars I paid for RS. I highly recommend this app!!""The application is simply super, languages are taught like a game! Very helpful comments from other users on your exercises. Bought a Premium package without hesitation!"

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Im using polish one. Sometimes voices are low and normal. But it is totally not important! Busuu is sweet!
reviews.author: Ezgi Ostrowski

reviews.title: Polish language
reviews.comment: Fantastic way to learn a new language....
reviews.author: david rothery

reviews.title: Ummm...
reviews.comment: Would love to down load full version ...but I\'m so cheap!
reviews.author: ro ly

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to use this app it refuses to even open.
reviews.author: Andy Barrett

reviews.title: Great interactive and easy to use..
reviews.comment: Great interactive and easy to use app... Motivating and consice!
reviews.author: Anthony Zeder

reviews.title: Nice app for learning on the move
reviews.comment: Great app. Would be nice if all functionality of the website was implemented, such as audio recording, but good nonetheless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun learning enviornment
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this interactive app and feel studying Polish would be very easy. I also like how the lessons are structured very much like a classroom, but wish there were more exercises on the app for mobile. I also use Babbel in conjunction to this app. I recommended this for anyone wanting to learn a new language.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really easy to use, words pronounced clearly and slowly. Continuous tests available so you can revise as you go along.
reviews.author: Maxine Dunbar

reviews.title: Must have!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app, other than the fact that you actually learn the language, this is a must have app if learning the Polish.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Learn Polish
reviews.comment: I have used other language learning apps but find this one the best, fun to learn and beautifully presented.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is excellent, very easy to understand and easy to follow.... Great to learn a new language
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad but....
reviews.comment: Some of the content is you wish and the interface is dated, and designed for as phone not a tablet. Still, it does the job and is not a bad tool for learning.just wish they would bring it into the 21st century.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dissapointed
reviews.comment: audio fragments are missing and some audio have low quality or very quite voices. I was going to buy full course after complite the first lesson but then find out that next lessons are not usefull because of serious sound issues. Im afraid that they have only the first lesson with good quality only and then you have to pay for different quality product.
reviews.author: A Google User
